```{r , echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
code <- 10316
d <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/KBO/kbo_stats.rds")
d <- d[d$playerId == code,]
vars <- c("season","age","pitIp","K9","BB9","HR9","pitBABIP","pitEra","FIP","pitWAR")
d <- na.omit(d[vars])
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,1,1,1,3,2,2,2), row.names = F, col.names = c("Season","Age","IP","K/9","BB/9","HR/9","BABIP","ERA","FIP","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T)
```
